content.description: Directions: You will hear a brief exchange between two people. From the four choices printed, choose the most appropriate remark that the first speaker could make in response to the remark of the second speaker.
content.question: NOW GET READY FOR THE BRIEF EXCHANGE.

choices.label: Ich finde seine anderen Filme besser.
Seine Filme sind alle auf DVD zu kaufen.
Es gibt eine Petersen-Filmwoche im Palastkino.
Ich gehe doch gern ins Kino.

content.answer: Ich finde seine anderen Filme besser.

unit.text: 5: Factors That Impact the Quality of Life

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe the literal meaning of the text.
